question_sql_pairs.question: Tell me all the districts in afghanistan
question_sql_pairs.sql: SELECT DISTINCT District FROM city WHERE CountryCode = (SELECT Code FROM country WHERE Name = 'Afghanistan');

question_sql_pairs.question: Top 3 countries with maximum GNP from Central Africa region
question_sql_pairs.sql: SELECT Name, GNP FROM country WHERE Region = 'Central Africa' ORDER BY GNP DESC LIMIT 3;

question_sql_pairs.question: Tell me all the districts in australia
question_sql_pairs.sql: SELECT DISTINCT District FROM city WHERE CountryCode = (SELECT Code FROM country WHERE Name = 'Australia');

question_sql_pairs.question: Tell me all the languages being spoken in belgium
question_sql_pairs.sql: SELECT Language FROM language WHERE CountryCode = (SELECT Code FROM country WHERE Name = 'Belgium');

question_sql_pairs.question: Tell me all the districts in Netherlands
question_sql_pairs.sql: SELECT DISTINCT District FROM city WHERE CountryCode = (SELECT Code FROM country WHERE Name = 'Netherlands');
